original_text: They must make the man pay 100 pieces of silver to the young woman's father. The man has told lies. He has accused a pure Israelite girl to say that she is bad. After that, she will continue to be his wife. He may never send her away as long as he lives.
korean_text: 이스라엘 처녀에게 누명을 씌움으로 말미암아 그에게서 은 일백 세겔을 벌금으로 받아 여자의 아버지에게 주고 그 여자는 그 남자가 평생에 버릴 수 없는 아내가 되게 하려니와

sentences.original_text: They must make the man pay 100 pieces of silver
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그 남자에게 은 100조각을 지불하게 해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: He has accused a pure Israelite girl
to say that she is bad
After that, she will continue to be his wife
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에, 그녀는 계속해서 그의 아내가 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He may never send her away
